channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Spring Config Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Spring Config Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-46687|2024-08-03T14:39:38.257Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20spring%20config%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Spring Config Plugin 2.0.0 and earlier does not escape build display names shown on the Spring Config view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to change build display names.
